original_text: Immediately she fell down at his feet and breathed her last. When the young men came in they found her dead, and they carried her out and buried her beside her husband.
korean_text: 곧 그가 베드로의 발 앞에 엎드러져 혼이 떠나는지라 젊은 사람들이 들어와 죽은 것을 보고 메어다가 그의 남편 곁에 장사하니

sentences.original_text: Immediately she fell down at his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 즉시 그의 발 앞에 쓰러졌고

sentences.original_text: When the young men came in
and buried her beside her husband.
